Sub create_ldap_Struktur() GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN_Global") Use_Aladin() drop_LDAP() create_ldap_data_temp() create_ldap_data() create_ldap_entries() create_ldap_attr_mapping() create_ldap_entry_objclasses() create_ldap_org() create_ldap_oc_mappings() End Sub
Sub drop_LDAP() Use_Aladin() sSQL="drop view if exists ldap_data" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop table if exists ldap_data" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop table if exists ldap_data_table" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop view if exists ldap_entries" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop table if exists ldap_entries" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop table if exists ldap_org" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop table if exists ldap_attr_mappings" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop table if exists ldap_entry_objclasses" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="drop table if exists ldap_oc_mappings" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) End Sub

Sub create_ldap_org() sSQL="create table ldap_org "&_ "(id integer not null primary key auto_increment,"&_ "name varchar(100))" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="insert into ldap_org (id,name) "&_ "values (1,'ALADIN')" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) End Sub

Sub create_ldap_oc_mappings() sSQL="create table ldap_oc_mappings "&_ "(id integer unsigned not null primary key auto_increment,"&_ "name varchar(64) not null,"&_ "keytbl varchar(64) not null,"&_ "keycol varchar(64) not null,"&_ "create_proc varchar(255),"&_ "delete_proc varchar(255),"&_ "expect_return tinyint not null)" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="insert into ldap_oc_mappings "&_ "(id,name,keytbl,keycol,create_proc,delete_proc,expect_return)"&_ "values (1,'inetOrgPerson','ldap_data','id',NULL,NULL,0)" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="insert into ldap_oc_mappings "&_ "(id,name,keytbl,keycol,create_proc,delete_proc,expect_return)"&_ "values (2,'mozillaAbPersonAlpha','ldap_data','id',NULL,NULL,0)" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) sSQL="insert into ldap_oc_mappings "&_ "(id,name,keytbl,keycol,create_proc,delete_proc,expect_return)"&_ "values (3,'organization','ldap_org','id',NULL,NULL,0)" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) End Sub
Sub create_ldap_data() sSQL="create table ldap_data "&_ "(id bigint(20) not null primary key auto_increment,"&_ "Gruppe varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Anrede varchar(20) not null,"&_ "Name varchar(100) not null,"&_ "Name1 varchar(100) not null,"&_ "Titel varchar(20) not null,"&_ "Vorname varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Land varchar(20) not null,"&_ "PLZ varchar(10) not null,"&_ "Ort varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Strasse varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Hausnummer varchar(10) not null,"&_ "Telefon varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Funktelefon varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Fax varchar(50) not null,"&_ "EMail varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Url varchar(50) not null,"&_ "Bemerkungen varchar(2000) not null)" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) End Sub

Sub create_ldap_entries() sSQL="create table ldap_entries "&_ "(id integer unsigned not null primary key auto_increment,"&_ "dn varchar(255) not null,"&_ "oc_map_id integer unsigned not null references ldap_oc_mappings(id),"&_ "parent int NOT NULL,"&_ "keyval int NOT NULL)" SQL_execute_mysql(sSQL) End Sub
